Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.animation

Class TransformFrame

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.animation.TransformFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.animation.Frame<TransformFrame>
public final class TransformFrame extends Object implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.animation.Frame<TransformFrame>
A frame of an animation over a Transform. All 3 components (TRS) are encoded as axis-aligned deltas from a base state of `(0, 0, 0)`.
